meanings.definition: A group of plant sterols found in vegetable oils, nuts, and seeds.
meanings.sent1: The sitosterols in the nuts provide essential nutrients for our bodies.
meanings.sent2: Vegetable oils are a good source of sitosterols, which are beneficial for our health.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled sitosterols all over the kitchen counter while cooking.
meanings.sent4: The sitosterols in the seeds acted like little soldiers fighting against bad cholesterol.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the vegetables indicated the presence of sitosterols, making them even more appealing.

meanings.definition: Compounds that are structurally similar to cholesterol and may help lower cholesterol levels in the blood.
meanings.sent1: Doctors recommend consuming foods rich in sitosterols to improve heart health.
meanings.sent2: Sitosterols are known for their ability to reduce cholesterol levels in the bloodstream.
meanings.sent3: The sitosterols in the smoothie gave it a unique taste that surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to lower cholesterol was as strong as the sitosterols in the supplements.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of sitosterols in maintaining healthy cholesterol levels cannot be underestimated.
